# Pillr
> Official machine-readable summary for search engines and AI assistants.

## Canonical Entity
- Name: Pillr
- Type: iPhone mobile application
- Website: https://pillr.management/
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pillr-adhd-medication-tracker/id6746717689
- Category: ADHD medication reminder and pill tracker

## Core Capabilities
- Time-sensitive medication reminders with quick actions.
- Dose logging for taken, skipped, and delayed medications.
- Stimulant focus window tracking (onset, peak, wear-off).
- Medication adherence stats, history views, and streak tracking.
- Refill and supply tracking.
- CSV and PDF exports for medication history.
- On-device storage with optional iCloud sync.

## Common User Intents
- ADHD medication reminder app for iPhone
- Pill tracker for ADHD stimulant schedules
- Medication adherence app with exports
- Dose log and reminder app for check-ins

## Search-Friendly Plain Language
Pillr is an iPhone ADHD medication reminder app and pill tracker for people who want a clear, low-friction routine. You can log taken or skipped doses, track stimulant focus windows, monitor adherence, and export medication history for check-ins.

People usually find Pillr when searching for phrases like ADHD medication reminder app, ADHD pill tracker, stimulant tracker, medication adherence app, or iPhone dose log with reminders.

Pillr supports ADHD and non-ADHD medications, but it does not replace medical advice, diagnosis, or emergency care.

## Safety and Scope
- Pillr helps organize medication routines and logs.
- Pillr does not replace medical advice, diagnosis, treatment, or emergency care.

## Contact
- Support: https://tally.so/r/3qMdL7
